answers.author: Gerald Young
answers.text:
The ICMA Center for Performance Measurement tracks a number of fleet management measures, but that effort focuses on actual maintenance expenditures, not the amount that jurisdictions may choose to budget for replacement.  In addition, some jurisdictions may budget for less than the full replacement cost, assuming that not all vehicles will need to be replaced when scheduled.  The recent bid history for your area may be the best guide to the prices you are likely to see in the coming year.

author: Mark DiPasquale
text: I am preparing a fleet replacement schedule and the schedule that was prepared previously used an inflation rate on current replacement costs of 2%, eventhough historical inflation has been around 3% to 3.5% in our area.  What is the typical inflation rate that is used for equipment or vehicle replacement values?
title: Fleet Replacement Inflation Factors
